infos.value: Who's that in the golden armor!?
Lord Sterne!? Why would he wear such armor?
And yet I find you on your deathbed!
Who did it!? Who inflicted these wounds upon Oelde!?
He's my prey! You were all made aware of this, were you not!?
(I cannot allow Sterne and Father to come to blows. But how do I...?)
They didn't want you to have all the glory for yourself, and so they attacked Father!
Y-you bastards! You've robbed me of my hunt!
Well played, Lord Mont. As expected.
Now! Rally behind Sterne! Rout Fennes's forces!
